snippet.title: IKUMA - The Frozen Compass | Official Reveal Trailer | Coming 2026
snippet.description:
The first look at the upcoming adventure IKUMA by Mooneye Studios

►►► Wishlist now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1728620/IKUMA__The_Frozen_Compass/?utm_source=youtube&utm_content=announcement&utm_campaign=organic

····················································································

Embark on a haunting journey into the cold in this narrative adventure - either alone or with a friend. IKUMA tells the story of Sam, a teenage boy who finds himself stranded in the Arctic with his dog. He must face not only its harsh environment, but also something lurking deeper in the shadows.

····················································································

MORE LINKS:

• https://twitter.com/MooneyeStudios
• https://www.facebook.com/mooneyestudios/
• https://www.instagram.com/mooneyestudios/

https://www.mooneyestudios.com/
